name: Mono (itch) (TimTipGames)
description:
MONO is an art inspired game. You control an eye through a series of levels which feature puzzle and skill based elements.

MONO is a game I made in 48h for the Ludum Dare competition #26. It was ranked first out of ~1600 entries.

If you have fun playing it, please consider giving me a (Tim)Tip! 

Thanks for taking the time to check the game out and make sure to visit www.timtips.com for more games!

You need a working java installation for this game to work.

Windows: download the mono.exe and double-click to start

Other OS: execute the mono-timtips-standalone.jar

If you don't know what that means, just try to double-click the jar file. Feel free to contact me if you have problems.
